about_the_game:
Help your Ball-friend to find and complete every level in a flooded city run by Ratmaster. Try to locate every star in every level in order to unlock the exit door, find out codes to open sliding doors to proceed and most importantly: HAVE FUN! Colourful, cute and sometimes frustrating, old school platformer with (hopefully) more levels to come in the future.

- 10+ levels to explore
- 2-4 hours of playtime
- 3 math problems (cause everyone loves math ;) to solve the 2nd code
- easy to learn, hard to complete
- more levels coming (hopefully) in the future. For FREE, of course!
- possible to play with controller, although not all features support controller (like opening & closing journal)

This is my first game ever and i know it´s not by any means perfect or revolutionary, quite opposite, it´s very traditional adventure platformer, even so i made it with my own "little" hands and i´m somewhat happy for the result. Please, if you happen to try FreshBallFall consider giving me feedback, positive or negative, so i can develop my skills further.
detailed_description:
Help your Ball-friend to find and complete every level in a flooded city run by Ratmaster. Try to locate every star in every level in order to unlock the exit door, find out codes to open sliding doors to proceed and most importantly: HAVE FUN! Colourful, cute and sometimes frustrating, old school platformer with (hopefully) more levels to come in the future.

- 10+ levels to explore
- 2-4 hours of playtime
- 3 math problems (cause everyone loves math ;) to solve the 2nd code
- easy to learn, hard to complete
- more levels coming (hopefully) in the future. For FREE, of course!
- possible to play with controller, although not all features support controller (like opening & closing journal)

This is my first game ever and i know it´s not by any means perfect or revolutionary, quite opposite, it´s very traditional adventure platformer, even so i made it with my own "little" hands and i´m somewhat happy for the result. Please, if you happen to try FreshBallFall consider giving me feedback, positive or negative, so i can develop my skills further.
name: FreshBallFall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Colourful 3D-platformer where you help your Ball-friend in his adventures through different levels and obsticles.
